name: @relive/graphhopper-api-client
description: Open source Javascript / Typescript client to the Graphhopper API, generated with OpenAPI

scripts.generate: rm -rf src/generated && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i swagger.json -g typescript-axios  -o src/generated/graphhopper-api --additional-properties=withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,modelPackage=model,apiPackage=api,useSingleRequestParameter=true

author: Relive
